00043 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 |   Defines
00045 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 typedef NPT_List<NPT_String> PLT_StringList;
00047 
00048 typedef struct {
00049     PLT_StringList play_media;
00050     PLT_StringList rec_media;
00051     PLT_StringList rec_quality_modes;
00052 } PLT_DeviceCapabilities;
00053 
00054 typedef struct {
00055     NPT_UInt32    num_tracks;
00056     NPT_TimeStamp media_duration;
00057     NPT_String    cur_uri;
00058     NPT_String    cur_metadata;
00059     NPT_String    next_uri;
00060     NPT_String    next_metadata;
00061     NPT_String    play_medium;
00062     NPT_String    rec_medium;
00063     NPT_String    write_status;
00064 } PLT_MediaInfo;
00065 
00066 typedef struct {
00067     NPT_UInt32    track;
00068     NPT_TimeStamp track_duration;
00069     NPT_String    track_metadata;
00070     NPT_String    track_uri;
00071     NPT_TimeStamp rel_time;
00072     NPT_TimeStamp abs_time;
00073     NPT_Int32     rel_count;
00074     NPT_Int32     abs_count;
00075 } PLT_PositionInfo;
00076 
00077 typedef struct {
00078     NPT_String cur_transport_state;
00079     NPT_String cur_transport_status;
00080     NPT_String cur_speed;
00081 } PLT_TransportInfo;
00082 
00083 typedef struct {
00084     NPT_String play_mode;
00085     NPT_String rec_quality_mode;
00086 } PLT_TransportSettings;
00087 
00088 typedef struct {
00089     NPT_UInt32 rcs_id;
00090     NPT_UInt32 avtransport_id;
00091     NPT_String protocol_info;
00092     NPT_String peer_connection_mgr;
00093     NPT_UInt32 peer_connection_id;
00094     NPT_String direction;
00095     NPT_String status;
00096 } PLT_ConnectionInfo;

00098 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00099 |   PLT_MediaControllerDelegate
00100 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00101 class PLT_MediaControllerDelegate
00102 {
00103 public:
00104     virtual ~PLT_MediaControllerDelegate() {}
00105 
00106     virtual bool OnMRAdded(PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */) { return true; }
00107     virtual void OnMRRemoved(PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */) {}
00108     virtual void OnMRStateVariablesChanged(PLT_Service*                  /* service */, 
00109                                            NPT_List<PLT_StateVariable*>* /* vars */) {}
00110 
00111     // AVTransport
00112     virtual void OnGetCurrentTransportActionsResult(
00113         NPT_Result               /* res */, 
00114         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00115         PLT_StringList*          /* actions */, 
00116         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00117 
00118     virtual void OnGetDeviceCapabilitiesResult(
00119         NPT_Result               /* res */, 
00120         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00121         PLT_DeviceCapabilities*  /* capabilities */,
00122         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00123 
00124     virtual void OnGetMediaInfoResult(
00125         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00126         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00127         PLT_MediaInfo*           /* info */,
00128         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00129 
00130     virtual void OnGetPositionInfoResult(
00131         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00132         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00133         PLT_PositionInfo*        /* info */,
00134         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00135 
00136     virtual void OnGetTransportInfoResult(
00137         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00138         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00139         PLT_TransportInfo*       /* info */,
00140         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00141 
00142     virtual void OnGetTransportSettingsResult(
00143         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00144         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00145         PLT_TransportSettings*   /* settings */,
00146         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00147 
00148     virtual void OnNextResult(
00149         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00150         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00151         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00152 
00153     virtual void OnPauseResult(
00154         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00155         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00156         void*                    /* userdata */) {}  
00157 
00158     virtual void OnPlayResult(
00159         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00160         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00161         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00162 
00163     virtual void OnPreviousResult(
00164         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00165         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00166         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00167 
00168     virtual void OnSeekResult(
00169         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00170         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00171         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00172 
00173     virtual void OnSetAVTransportURIResult(
00174         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00175         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00176         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00177 
00178     virtual void OnSetPlayModeResult(
00179         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00180         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00181         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00182 
00183     virtual void OnStopResult(
00184         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00185         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00186         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00187         
00188     // ConnectionManager
00189     virtual void OnGetCurrentConnectionIDsResult(
00190         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00191         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00192         PLT_StringList*          /* ids */,
00193         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00194 
00195     virtual void OnGetCurrentConnectionInfoResult(
00196         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00197         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00198         PLT_ConnectionInfo*      /* info */,
00199         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00200 
00201     virtual void OnGetProtocolInfoResult(
00202         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00203         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00204         PLT_StringList*          /* sources */,
00205         PLT_StringList*          /* sinks */,
00206         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00207         
00208     // RenderingControl
00209     virtual void OnSetMuteResult(
00210         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00211         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00212         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00213 
00214     virtual void OnGetMuteResult(
00215         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00216         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00217         const char*              /* channel */,
00218         bool                     /* mute */,
00219         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00220 
00221     virtual void OnSetVolumeResult(
00222         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00223         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00224         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00225 
00226     virtual void OnGetVolumeResult(
00227         NPT_Result               /* res */,
00228         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */,
00229         const char*              /* channel */,
00230         NPT_UInt32               /* volume */,
00231         void*                    /* userdata */) {}
00232 };

00234 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00235 |   PLT_MediaController
00236 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00237 class PLT_MediaController : public PLT_CtrlPointListener
00238 {
00239 public:
00240     PLT_MediaController(PLT_CtrlPointReference&      ctrl_point, 
00241                         PLT_MediaControllerDelegate* delegate = NULL);
00242     virtual ~PLT_MediaController();
00243 
00244     // public methods
00245     virtual void SetDelegate(PLT_MediaControllerDelegate* delegate) {
00246         m_Delegate = delegate;
00247     }
00248 
00249     // PLT_CtrlPointListener methods
00250     virtual NPT_Result OnDeviceAdded(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device);
00251     virtual NPT_Result OnDeviceRemoved(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device);
00252     virtual NPT_Result OnActionResponse(NPT_Result res, PLT_ActionReference& action, void* userdata);
00253     virtual NPT_Result OnEventNotify(PLT_Service* service, NPT_List<PLT_StateVariable*>* vars);
00254 
00255     // AVTransport
00256     NPT_Result GetCurrentTransportActions(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, void* userdata);
00257     NPT_Result GetDeviceCapabilities(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, void* userdata);
00258     NPT_Result GetMediaInfo(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, void* userdata);
00259     NPT_Result GetPositionInfo(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device,  NPT_UInt32 instance_id, void* userdata);
00260     NPT_Result GetTransportInfo(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, void* userdata);
00261     NPT_Result GetTransportSettings(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, void* userdata);
00262     NPT_Result Next(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, void* userdata);
00263     NPT_Result Pause(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, void* userdata);
00264     NPT_Result Play(PLT_DeviceDataReference&  device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, NPT_String speed, void* userdata);
00265     NPT_Result Previous(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, void* userdata);
00266     NPT_Result Seek(PLT_DeviceDataReference&  device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, NPT_String unit, NPT_String target, void* userdata);
00267     NPT_Result SetAVTransportURI(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, const char* uri, const char* metadata, void* userdata);
00268     NPT_Result SetPlayMode(PLT_DeviceDataReference&  device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, NPT_String new_play_mode, void* userdata);
00269     NPT_Result Stop(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, void* userdata);
00270 
00271     // ConnectionManager
00272     NPT_Result GetCurrentConnectionIDs(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, void* userdata);
00273     NPT_Result GetCurrentConnectionInfo(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_UInt32 connection_id, void* userdata);
00274     NPT_Result GetProtocolInfo(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, void* userdata);
00275     
00276     // RenderingControl
00277     NPT_Result SetMute(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, const char* channel, bool mute, void* userdata);
00278     NPT_Result GetMute(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, const char* channel, void* userdata);
00279     NPT_Result SetVolume(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, const char* channel, int volume, void* userdata);
00280     NPT_Result GetVolume(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_UInt32 instance_id, const char* channel, void* userdata); 
00281 
00282     // methods    
00283     virtual NPT_Result FindRenderer(const char* uuid, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device);
00284     virtual NPT_Result GetProtocolInfoSink(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, NPT_List<NPT_String>& sinks);
00285     virtual NPT_Result FindMatchingProtocolInfo(NPT_List<NPT_String>& sinks,
00286                                                 const char*           protocol_info);
00287     virtual NPT_Result FindBestResource(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, PLT_MediaObject& item, NPT_Cardinal& resource_index);
00288 
00289 private:
00290     NPT_Result InvokeActionWithInstance(PLT_ActionReference& action,
00291         NPT_UInt32               instance_id,
00292         void*                    userdata = NULL);
00293 
00294     NPT_Result OnGetCurrentTransportActionsResponse(NPT_Result res, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, PLT_ActionReference& action, void* userdata);
00295     NPT_Result OnGetDeviceCapabilitiesResponse(NPT_Result res, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, PLT_ActionReference& action, void* userdata);
00296     NPT_Result OnGetMediaInfoResponse(NPT_Result res, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, PLT_ActionReference& action, void* userdata);
00297     NPT_Result OnGetPositionInfoResponse(NPT_Result res, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, PLT_ActionReference& action, void* userdata);
00298     NPT_Result OnGetTransportInfoResponse(NPT_Result res, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, PLT_ActionReference& action, void* userdata);
00299     NPT_Result OnGetTransportSettingsResponse(NPT_Result res, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, PLT_ActionReference& action, void* userdata);
00300 
00301     NPT_Result OnGetCurrentConnectionIDsResponse(NPT_Result res, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, PLT_ActionReference& action, void* userdata);
00302     NPT_Result OnGetCurrentConnectionInfoResponse(NPT_Result res, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, PLT_ActionReference& action, void* userdata);
00303     NPT_Result OnGetProtocolInfoResponse(NPT_Result res, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, PLT_ActionReference& action, void* userdata);
00304     
00305     NPT_Result OnGetMuteResponse(NPT_Result res, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, PLT_ActionReference& action, void* userdata);
00306     NPT_Result OnGetVolumeResponse(NPT_Result res, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, PLT_ActionReference& action, void* userdata);
00307 
00308 public:
00309     static void ParseCSV(const char* csv, PLT_StringList& values) {
00310         const char* start = csv;
00311         const char* p = start;
00312 
00313         // look for the , character
00314         while (*p) {
00315             if (*p == ',') {
00316                 NPT_String val(start, (int)(p-start));
00317                 val.Trim(' ');
00318                 values.Add(val);
00319                 start = p + 1;
00320             }
00321             p++;
00322         }
00323 
00324         // last one
00325         NPT_String last(start, (int)(p-start));
00326         last.Trim(' ');
00327         if (last.GetLength()) {
00328             values.Add(last);
00329         }
00330     }
00331 
00332 private:
00333     PLT_CtrlPointReference                m_CtrlPoint;
00334     PLT_MediaControllerDelegate*          m_Delegate;
00335     NPT_Lock<PLT_DeviceDataReferenceList> m_MediaRenderers;
00336 };
00337 
00338 #endif /* _PLT_MEDIA_CONTROLLER_H_ */
